name: dsa-mastery-plugin
description: Ultimate Data Structures & Algorithms learning plugin with 7 expert agents, 8+ skills, 300+ problems, and interview preparation guide.
author: DSA Community

agents.name: Arrays & Lists
agents.description: Master array and list data structures with sliding window, two pointers, and prefix sum techniques

agents.name: Trees & Binary Trees
agents.description: Expert in tree traversals, BSTs, balanced trees, and tree dynamic programming

agents.name: Graphs & Graph Algorithms
agents.description: Master graph representations, DFS/BFS, shortest paths, topological sort, and Union-Find

agents.name: Dynamic Programming
agents.description: Expert in optimization through memoization, tabulation, and DP state design

agents.name: Searching & Sorting
agents.description: Master sorting algorithms, binary search, and comparison-based optimizations

agents.name: Hash Tables & Sets
agents.description: Expert in hash-based data structures, frequency counting, LRU cache, and duplicate detection

agents.name: Greedy & Advanced Algorithms
agents.description: Master greedy strategies, backtracking, bit manipulation, and mathematical algorithms

commands.name: problem-solver
commands.description: Browse and solve 300+ DSA problems organized by topic and difficulty

commands.name: difficulty-selector
commands.description: Choose learning path based on your skill level and experience

commands.name: interview-prep
commands.description: Master top 20 interview questions and coding interview strategies

commands.name: complexity-analyzer
commands.description: Understand and analyze time and space complexity with visual charts
